name: NOT ME (notmevr)
description:
━━━━⋅「Important!」⋅━━━━

Our games are now in the early access stage. The whole test lasts one month. In order to better collect players' opinions, our game is free during the test period. Join our discord and add our game to your wishlist(APPLab) before its release to get our game for free and participate in our testing.

┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓

┣Limited Time Event!Join our discord to get the game for free! ┣https://discord.gg/685Mke72vf ┣Limited Time Event!Join our discord to get the game for free! ┣You can also add our games to your wishlist(AppLab) ┣https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5367990529975533

┗━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┛

WHAT IS NOTME?

Not me is an asymmetric VR game. The theme is an exciting survival adventure on a deserted island, as a werewolf or human.

Eight adventurers will explore the mysterious island, but the ship has been damaged by the storm. The werewolves on the island had already killed the two adventurers and blended into the team. You must discover who the wolves are while trying to gather supplies and repair the boat.

Please note!

Our games now support: quest1&2 Pico and steamVR streaming.

Please download the corresponding APK according to your device model.

To learn how to install our game, we recommend watching this video:

If you have more questions, please join our discord and contact the administrator

https://discord.gg/685Mke72vf
